biotools.summary: This package was developed to simplify the use of BioConductor tools for beginners having limited or no experience in writing R code. This library provides a graphical interface for microarray gene and exon level analysis as well as miRNA/mRNA-seq data analysis.

bioschemas.name: oneChannelGUI
bioschemas.summary: This package was developed to simplify the use of BioConductor tools for beginners having limited or no experience in writing R code. This library provides a graphical interface for microarray gene and exon level analysis as well as miRNA/mRNA-seq data analysis.
